changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product_relationship_access_authorization AS SELECT a.id, p.name AS product, ptr.name AS product_relationship, r.name AS relationship, l.name AS relationship, ctr.name AS relationship_relationship FROM ruleform.access_authorization a JOIN ruleform.product p ON a.product1 = p.id JOIN ruleform.relationship ptr ON a.parent_transitive_relationship = ptr.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r ON a.relationship = r.id JOIN ruleform.relationship l ON a.relationship2 = l.id JOIN ruleform.relationship ctr ON a.child_transitive_relationship = ctr.id WHERE a.authorization_type = '7';
ALTER TABLE readable.product_relationship_access_authorization OWNER TO core;
